name: Anarchy Arcade
description: Turn your entire digital life into a game. AArcade is a 3D desktop that launches shortcuts to absolutely anything you like. Join the anarchy of the persistent online metaverse, or remain in your own private reality. Casual in-game building features, plus hundreds of thousands of addons.
minimum_requirements: OS: WindowsÂ® 7 (32/64-bit)/Vista/XP Processor: 2.0 GHz Processor Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Video card must be 256 MB or more and should be a DirectX 9-compatible DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 5 GB available space Additional Notes: A QWERTY keyboard and a mouse are also required.  An internet connection is required for internet connectivity.
